lines.text:
[to Curly]
What're ya doin' with that rifle? Don't you know any better than to use a rifle? You might miss him!
[Grabs a shotgun]
Here, use a shotgun!
We dunno anything about flyin'!
Neither did the Wright brothers, but they flew! Anything the Wright brothers can do, the Wrong brothers can do! Right?
Right!
Wrong.
[Moe and Larry gang up on him]
Brothers!
I don't know why the Sky Aircraft Company decided to hire three screwballs like the Wrong brothers.
They're either miracle men or they're insane.

[to Moe who is about to hit him with an oar Larry used to mix the rubber cement]
Don't you dare hit me in the head! You know I'm not normal!
I'll normal you!
[prepares to hit Curly, but the oar sticks to Larry's hair due to the rubber cement]

[seeing Curly sawing one of the plane's wings]
No, nitwit! You saw the garage!
I see the garage, but I don't saw the garage. You are speaking incorrectly. You are moidering the king's English! Et cetera! See, saw, see...

[grabs Curly by the neck and shakes him]
Shut up! You saw one side and Larry will saw the other.
Oh I see, I saw!
[saws Moe's arm]

[grabs the saw from Curly]
Not like that, like this!
[smacks Curly in the face with the saw then saws his head as Curly yells in pain]
Oh, look!
[he and Moe notice that Curly's head destroyed the saw's edges]
We're losing altitude. We gotta get rid of some weight.

[Larry and Moe look at Curly]
What are you looking at me for?
Hey Moe, what are you doin' up there?
It's the gas, you idiots!
Can I get you some bicarbonate?
Shut up and get me down!
We're great inventors... Robert Fulton, Thomas Edison, Alexander Graham Bell, Don Ameche, and us!

[to Curly]
Where's your vice?
Vice? I have no vice. I'm as pure as driven snow.
But ya drifted!
[bonk]
